name: Exponential Balls
description:
Click to download V1.1 with a few fixes (an hour after the deadline, so Mark look away)

A game about Exponential Balls. Get through the labyrinth with the help of your balls. 

WASD to move, SPACE to jump, CLICK to spawn more balls!

  • Game about balls
  • Our Composer wouldn't stop watching anime and only made like one track
  • Check it out on Github
